summary: I made this for my own use because I was frustrated that the only unique Stalhrim armor was for light armor users, and I used heavy armor. This mod simply makes the Deathbrand Armor Heavy Stalhrim instead of Light Stalhrim (stats, model, and world model are all modified).
descriptionHtml:
I made this for my own use because I was frustrated that the only unique Stalhrim armor was for light armor users, and I used heavy armor. This mod simply makes the Deathbrand Armor Heavy Stalhrim instead of Light Stalhrim (stats, model, and world model are all modified).

Obviously, this mod requires Dragonborn.

Enjoy!
author: Amblingalong
